Workflow should 

Provision EC2 instance
Install Docker & Dependencies
Pull Docker Images 
Run Flask Backend and React Frontend containers
Configure Nginx Reverse proxy (optional)

pre-requistes 
AWS IAM user
EC2 key pair 
Github secrets 
    AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID
    AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY
    AWS_REGION
    EC2_INSTANCE_ID (If using an existing instance)
    EC2_SSH_KEY (Your SSH private key, for remote access)
